org.apache.karaf.wrapper

Interface WrapperService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WrapperServiceImpl

    public interface WrapperService
    Interface describing the Wrapper service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void install()
      Install the Karaf container as a system service in the OS.
      java.io.File[] install(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String startType)
      Install the Karaf container as a system service in the OS.
      java.io.File[] install(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String startType, java.lang.String[] envs, java.lang.String[] includes)

    • Method Detail

      • install

        void install()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Install the Karaf container as a system service in the OS.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the wrapper install fails.

      • install

        java.io.File[] install(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String displayName,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String startType)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Install the Karaf container as a system service in the OS.
        Parameters:
        name - The service name that will be used when installing the service.
        displayName - The display name of the service.
        description - The description of the service.
        startType - Mode in which the service is installed. AUTO_START or DEMAND_START.
        Returns:
        An array containing the wrapper configuration file (index 0) and the service file (index 1).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the wrapper install fails.

      • install

        java.io.File[] install(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String displayName,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String startType,
                       java.lang.String[] envs,
                       java.lang.String[] includes)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Install the Karaf container as a system service in the OS.
        Parameters:
        name - The service name that will be used when installing the service.
        displayName - The display name of the service.
        description - The description of the service.
        startType - Mode in which the service is installed. AUTO_START or DEMAND_START.
        envs - The environment variable and values
        includes - The include statement for JSW wrapper conf
        Returns:
        An array containing the wrapper configuration file (index 0) and the service file (index 1).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the wrapper install fails.
